articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK and HCWP
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK and HCWP
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here on Thursday between delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party.
					 Present there from the WPK side were Secretary Kim Yong Il and officials of the WPK Central Committee and from the opposite side were members of the delegation of the HCWP headed by Chairman Gyula Thurmer. 
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on the issue of further developing the relations between the two parties and matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Gift from Chairman of Hungarian Party
articles.content:
Gift from Chairman of Hungarian Party
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, on a visit to the DPRK. 
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by the chairman on Thursday.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Closes
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Closes 
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia show celebrating the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea was closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition here on Thursday. 
					 During the show it was visited by the delegates to the national celebrations of the 65th birthday of the WPK, officials of ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, working people and school youth and children and overseas compatriots and foreign guests, at least 100,000 in all. 
					
					 Attending the closing ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan celebrating the 65th anniversary of the WPK, officials of armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Prize for special class went to the Unit of the Korean People's Army led by Kim Song Dok, the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and others, special prize to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, top prize and excellent prize to more than 60 units and prize of merit to several participants.
					
					 Kim Pyong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, said in his address made at the closing ceremony called on all participants to positively contribute to make the flower festivals praising the great persons to be held in the future more successful and meaningful.

articles.title: Reception at Palestinian Embassy
articles.content:
Reception at Palestinian Embassy
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan hosted a reception at his embassy Thursday in celebration of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th anniversary of the WPK.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said at the reception that they are happy to join the Korean people in celebrating Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK and its 65th birthday.
					
					 The friendly relations between the two countries are further developing under the deep care of Kim Jong Il and Mahmoud Abbas, he said, expressing belief that the WPK would perform miracles in all fields under the wise and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said in his speech that it is a great political event to have invariably had Kim Jong Il at the top post of the WPK and the revolution and this strikingly demonstrated the steadfast faith and will of all the servicepersons and people to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist power of Juche.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to steadily develop the traditional relations of friendship between the DPRK and Palestine provided by President Kim Il Sung and President Yasser Arafat, he said, adding:
					
					 We will extend invariable support and encouragement to the Palestinian people in the just cause of founding an independent sovereign state.

articles.title: Credentials of Indonesian Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Indonesian Ambassador Accepted
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Nasri Gustaman, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 After accepting the credentials Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Cambodian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Cambodian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers 
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Chhorn Hay and his embassy officials did a friendship work on the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Paeksok Cooperative Farm in Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province on Thursday.
					 After being briefed on the monument to President Kim Il Sung's on-site guidance to the farm, the guests helped farmers in rice harvesting.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Ugandan President Greets WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Ugandan President Greets WPK's Birthday
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda, congratulated General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and extended a militant salute to him energetically leading the overall affairs of the party, the army and the state.
					 The president said this when receiving credentials from Jong Thae Yang, DPRK ambassador to Uganda, on Oct. 7.
					
					 The DPRK has stood firm against the hostile forces thanks to the invincible might of the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il, he said, greeting the 65th birthday of the WPK.

articles.title: Terrapin-multiplying Technology Developed
articles.content:
Terrapin-multiplying Technology Developed
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Zoology Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences has developed a new technology for multiplying terrapin.
					 Generally, terrapin lays some 30 eggs in the sand at a time, but the hatching rate is only 37 percent in the natural condition.
					
					 After making an analysis of terrapin's biological features and breeding method, researchers of the institute have developed a new hatching method without using sand and put the control of temperature and humidity and other technical indices on a scientific basis.
					
					 The new technology makes it possible to select unfertilized or abortive eggs in time and raise the actual hatching rate considerably.
					
					 The simple but highly effective technology enjoyed popularity at the 11th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies held some time ago.

articles.title: Sariwon City Takes on New Look
articles.content:
Sariwon City Takes on New Look
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA)-- Sariwon City, the seat of North Hwanghae Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, has undergone a facelifting as required by the Songun era.
					 Some monumental edifices have sprung up in the city this year alone.
					
					 Sariwon Stadium, situated at the foot of picturesque Mt. Kyongam, and the nearby park were reconstructed in a matter of ten months.
					
					 The 20,000-seat stadium is furnished with an up-to-date scoring board, electronic display and facilities for different sports events and training as well as welfare facilities.
					
					 The Sariwon Zoo was also rebuilt on a modern basis, housing many animals including rare ones sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on several occasions.
					
					 It has scores of cages for such animals as tiger, monkey, bear and reptiles, aquarium, animal yards and souvenir shop.
					
					 The North Hwanghae Provincial People's Study House, with a floor space of more than 4 500 square metres, has appeared in the city. It gives such services as searching, reading and lecture with the help of computers and networks.
					
					 Besides, the city has built a large number of dwelling houses and constructed or updated many factories, including the Jongbangsan Foodstuff Combined Factory.

articles.title: Centenarians Increase
articles.content:
Centenarians Increase
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The number of centenarians is ever increasing in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Some time ago, Ri Hak Nyo, a woman in township of Mundok County, South Phyongan Province, received a spread sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on her 100th birthday.
					
					 Those greeting their 100th birthdays receive spreads from the leader. From the beginning of the year eleven people have enjoyed such luck in the country.
					
					 According to information available in a relevant organ, the number of centenarians has been on the steady increase in the country over the last decade. 
					
					 Among them is Jo In Gak, a 100-year-old man in Oknyu-dong No. 2. Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, who had continued farm work until two years ago even after he retired on a pension.
					
					 It draws experts' attention that towns, including Pyongyang, also boast of an increasing number of macrobians.
					
					 The fact goes to prove that towns are no less clear than rural areas in ecological environment, giving no adverse effect to the health of long-livers.
					
					 Most of them favor bean, vegetable and potato dishes as well as boiled rice admixed with four other staple cereals, and live a diligent and optimistic life.

articles.title: Adherence to Principles of National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Principles of National Reunification Called for
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The three principles of national reunification set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea-- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--are the most just and patriotic principles, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article.
					 It is the invariable stand of the WPK to achieve the country's reunification on the principle of national independence, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration correctly reflect the desire and demand of all Koreans for rejecting foreign forces and realizing the independent reunification by the united efforts of the nation. The adoption of these declarations, a reunification program common to the nation, and the admirable success made in the inter-Korean relations after it are a vivid demonstration of the validity and vitality of the WPK's principle of independent reunification.
					
					 It is the consistent principle of the WPK to reunify the country in a peaceful way.
					
					 The WPK has waged a dynamic struggle for national reunification under the banner of peaceful reunification over the past 60 years.  The proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by President Kim Il Sung at the 6th Congress of the WPK is the most patriotic and just proposal which embodied the principle of peaceful reunification. Nothing is better than the federation proposal in realizing national reunification. All Koreans at home and abroad are now making a vigorous struggle to materialize the federation proposal clarified in the historic June 15 joint declaration, zealously supporting it. This goes to prove the validity of the WPK's principle of peaceful reunification.
					
					 It is the fundamental principle of national reunification advocated by the WPK to realize the country's reunification by pooling efforts of all Koreans. 
					
					 The WPK regarded patriotism and the spirit of national independence as basis for national unity. The 10-point programme of great unity of the whole nation advanced by Kim Il Sung and the five-point policy for great national unity set forth by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on  the sacred road for national unity have served as the banner of national reconciliation and unity and as the guidelines of action. 
					
					 "By our nation itself", the idea of national unity, became a steadfast idea common to the nation and solidarity and alliance among the Koreans of different strata at home and abroad for national reunification have grown stronger than ever before on a nationwide scale. This is a shining fruition of the WPK's energetic efforts for achieving the country's reunification through the concerted efforts of the nation.

articles.title: More US  Documents on Nuclear Threat to DPRK Disclosed
articles.content:
More US  Documents on Nuclear Threat to DPRK Disclosed
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists have ceaselessly posed a nuclear threat to the DPRK since the 1950s of the last century. These hard facts were again disclosed by the documents on the Korean War recently declassified by the CIA and several other documents including the confidential documents discovered at the U.S. State National Archives.
					 According to these documents, U.S. nuclear weapons were deployed in south Korea in the mid-August of 1950 for the first time. In November of the same year U.S. President Truman blustered at a press conference that the U.S. had always positively examined the use of A-bombs. MacArthur did not hide the fact that the U.S. had a plan to drop 30 - 50 A-bombs in the border areas between the DPRK and China. 
					
					 The U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff issued an order to launch an A-bomb attack on the Chinese People's Volunteers with the approval of Truman in April next year only to cancel it. In September and October of the year B-29s of the U.S. Air Force staged madcap exercises for dropping A-bombs in the sky above Pyongyang.
					
					 When the U.S. imperialists were examining a new offensive in 1953 to recover from repeated setbacks in the Korean War the U.S. Air Force recommended the plan for the use of A-bombs and reported on the progress made in pushing forward the plan from May to July. 
					
					 Right after the war the U.S. Strategic Air Command sent to its Air Force Command top secret operation plan "8-53" on massively dropping A-bombs in the DPRK and China.
					
					 The U.S. Air Force side requested the authorities to deploy in south Korea more F-84Gs capable of dropping A-bombs.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. imperialists stockpiled in Okinawa various type nuclear warheads to be used in another Korean War, bringing their total number to 2 600 in 1967.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that in the 1960s the U.S. imperialists ordered the aircraft of the U.S. Air Force in south Korea carrying nuclear bombs to keep themselves ready for emergency sorties so that they might strike the DPRK within 15 minutes. 
					
					 In the subsequent period the U.S. military authorities officially admitted the deployment of nuclear weapons in south Korea and in April this year the U.S. Secretary of Defense, when briefing on the report on the nuclear posture review, blustered that the "U.S. had all options on the table", openly hinting at the possibility of nuclear attack.

articles.title: Japan's Wild Ambition to Stage Comeback to Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Wild Ambition to Stage Comeback to Korea under Fire
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- South Korean political parties and civic and social bodies on Oct. 12 launched an action against the participation of the Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force" in the PSI-related maritime interception and search exercises kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers in waters off Pusan on Oct. 13.
					 The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the south Korean Youth Solidarity and other bodies grouping people of various strata and the Democratic Labor Party held a news conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul.
					
					 The speakers charged at the news conference that the Japanese government is letting its MSDF illegally participate in the above-said exercises in an attempt to escalate the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, far from making an apology and reparation for Japan's past aggression, and thereby bringing its wild ambition to stage a comeback to Korea to light. 
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable to hurl even Japan's warships into the exercises targeting against the DPRK, they held, demanding the cancellation of the plan to let the MSDF involve in the exercises.
					
					 14 organizations including "The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification" and the Student Representatives' Council for Democracy and Independent Reunification held a rally near Kwanghwamun of Seoul.
					
					 The participants in the rally drew attention to the fact that warships of the MSDF are set to participate in the war drills targeted against the DPRK at Pusan Port and in waters off it, adding that no successive regime of south Korea has done what the Lee Myung Bak regime is doing at present. 
					
					 The Alliance for Progress in South Kyongsang Province at a news conference branded the projected exercises as actions running counter to the desire of the Korean nation for peace and detente on the peninsula and inviting aggressor Japan to stir up an atmosphere of war. 
					
					 The Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Solidarity for Progress, "the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps", the Sachon Alliance for Progress and other organizations in their statements demanded the south Korean authorities halt at once their reckless act of letting Japan realize its wild ambition for staging a comeback to Korea.

articles.title: Dangerous US-S. Korea War Confab under Fire
articles.content:
Dangerous US-S. Korea War Confab under Fire 
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The recent south Korea-U.S.  "annual security consultative meeting" held in Washington was a very dangerous confab aimed at tightening the military "alliance" for invading the DPRK and igniting a nuclear war at any cost on that basis. Leading newspapers Thursday observe this in their signed commentaries. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 This is proved by the newly worked out "guidelines for a strategic plan." The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces advertise them as the most perfect of their scenarios for a war of aggression against the DPRK as it is a comprehensive military reaction proposal for coping with "all the threats" including a "local provocation" from someone and an all-out war by combining the "OPLAN 5027" and "OPLAN 5015." The sinister intention of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers to ignite a war against the DPRK come what may is clearly revealed by the above-said dangerous war scenario. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces mentioned "instability" of someone in their "joint statement" and openly cried out for getting ready to cope with it. It is the first time that such word as "instability" of someone meaning "contingency" was mentioned in the "joint statement" issued at the above-said annual security consultative meeting. This was a vivid manifestation of the criminal scenario to stifle the DPRK by force of arms at any cost as it was an unprecedented provocation to the DPRK. 
					
					 The reality goes to prove that it is impossible to ensure durable peace on the Korean Peninsula nor is it possible for the Korean nation to escape from the danger of a nuclear war as long as the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces are allowed to keep the system for military cooperation and pursue cooperation and collusion to unleash a war. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that war and peace can never go together, warning that the army and people of the DPRK wish for peace, but will never allow the aggressors to come in attack on them.

articles.title: S. Korean  Forces' Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean  Forces' Military Exercises under Fire
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Preparatory Committee for Solidarity and Peace against War and the Joint Action for Probe into Warship "Cheonan" Case and Peace on the Korean Peninsula in south Korea in a joint statement released Monday vehemently denounced the madcap anti-DPRK war racket of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers.
					 The statement accused them of kicking off the two day-long U.S.-led PSI-related maritime interception and search exercises on Oct. 13 at Pusan Port and in the waters off it.
					
					 These exercises to be involved by huge war hardware including various type warships and war planes are grave provocations running counter to the peace of Asia and international law and an undisguised declaration of a war against the DPRK as their objective is to lay a network of maritime blockade against it, it noted, and continued: 
					
					What is more surprising is that the Japan Maritime "Self-Defence Force" was reported to be involved in the exercises, an intolerable insult to the Korean nation.
					
					 The statement urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to halt at once the racket of military confrontation posing a threat to the peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 It declared that dynamic actions would be staged throughout south Korea against the exercises while they are under way.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement on Oct. 10 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. The statement called on all the Koreans to bring earlier the reunification by implementing the north-south joint declarations under the banner of "By Korean nation itself."
					 The proposal is the most just one as it reflects the desire of the fellow countrymen to reunify the country at an early date and the specific realities of the south and north, it said.
					
					 It recalled that the south Koreans have made strenuous efforts for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea, the repeal of the "Security Law" and peace on the Korean Peninsula since the proposal was advanced.
					
					 The nation will surely punish the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors as it stands in the way of implementing the inter-Korean joint declarations, its urgent requirement, and pursues only an anti-reunification policy, the statement declared, calling on all the fellow countrymen to turn out in a dynamic struggle for independence against the U.S., the elimination of sycophants and traitors, the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and national reconciliation and unity under the uplifted banner of "By Korean nation itself".

articles.title: Police's Suppression Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Police's Suppression Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Peasants Associations, the Solidarity for Progress and other civic and social organizations at various levels in south Korea protested against the puppet police's unwarranted suppression, according to the Oct. 8 issue of Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea.
					 The organizations disclosed the fact that the police has constantly monitored internets of progressive organizations and pressurized them to cancel the articles which cast doubt about the "Cheonan" case and those related to the north on their homepages.
					
					 Moreover, the police forced the internets into deleting even the articles not related to the north, they said, deploring that they could hardly speak what they want in south Korea. 
					
					 They demanded an immediate halt to such illegal acts of the police as suppressing the freedom of expression.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Commemorated
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Commemorated
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings, book and photo exhibitions, lectures and film shows took place in Mexico, Democratic Congo, Indonesia, Thailand and the Czech Republic between Sept. 28 and Oct. 1 in celebration of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					On display in their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the 65-year-long history of the WPK crowned with victory and glory.
					
					Appreciated at the shows were Korean films "The Korean People's Army, Steel-like Ranks" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said at a meeting that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK is a great auspicious event of world historic significance as it instills great confidence and courage into the revolutionary parties and the progressives struggling for the victory of the cause of independence against imperialism and for the building of a new society.
					
					Only victory and glory are always in store for the WPK having Kim Jong Il at its top post, he said.
					
					The national executive secretary for foreign affairs of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo said at a meeting that the WPK has strengthened into an invincible party under the distinguished leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and his Songun politics, thereby creditably discharging its role as the organizer and guide of all victories for the Korean people and greatly encouraging the world progressive parties and people desirous of independence and progress.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, made public a statement on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 President Kim Il Sung advanced the proposal for founding the DFRK in October 1980, an immortal feat to shine long in the history of the Koreans' movement for reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Energetic activities of General Secretary Kim Jong Il resulted in formulating the three charters for national reunification which include the proposal for founding the DFRK and adopting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. This provided a sure guarantee for reunifying the country by federal formula based on the noble patriotic idea of "By the Korean nation itself" and a milestone for national reunification.
					
					 The proposal most correctly reflects the principle of independence, peaceful reunification and the great unity of the entire nation and the reality of the Korean Peninsula. It is a reasonable and just and aboveboard one for reunification as it fully meets the interests of the Korean nation and its neighboring countries.
					
					 The statement demanded the south Korean authorities and the U.S. stop their moves against the DPRK and the reunification of Korea.
					
					 It extended support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country free from outside interference, guided by the idea of "By the Korean nation itself."

articles.title: Undying Feats of WPK Lauded in Nigeria
articles.content:
Undying Feats of WPK Lauded in Nigeria 
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a statement on Oct. 3 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The WPK has been strengthened and developed into the most experienced and revolutionary party and an invincible party commanding absolute support and trust from the people over the last 65 years since it was founded by President Kim Il Sung, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The WPK has created a new shining history of carrying out the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism under the tested leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and thus performed immortal exploits in this course.
					
					 The history of the WPK precisely means a great history of revolutionary struggle of the President and that of revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is the glorious party as it paved a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence and set a shining example in it.
					
					 The WPK is now successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We sincerely wish the WPK good successes in the building of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Egypt
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nath Publishing House of Egypt on Oct. 7.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), is an immortal programme for party building and activities as it reviews with high pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which carved out a new path for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way for developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President.

articles.title: Bulletins Issued to Mark Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
Bulletins Issued to Mark Anniversary of WPK
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Bulgaria and Ethiopia issued bulletins to commemorate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried in the 5th issue of its bulletin several articles under such titles as "65th Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "News of the WPK Conference".
					
					 In those articles the bulletin noted that President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK and developed it into a popular party serving the broad masses of working people and that leader Kim Jong Il has wisely led the WPK by inheriting the idea and cause of the President and, in particular, he was reelected general secretary of the WPK at its Conference.
					
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea carried in the 16th issue of its bulletin an article titled "Emblem of the WPK".
					
					 The article introduced in detail the emblem of the WPK, saying that 65 years of the WPK are unthinkable without the emblem clearly representing the characteristics of the Party.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Far Eastern Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Songun Policy of Russia released the 2nd issue of its newspaper "Banner of Mt. Paektu" on the same occasion.
					
					 The newspaper carried a portrait of Kim Il Sung and a picture of Kim Jong Il waving back to the cheering crowd and several articles introducing the WPK.
					
					 Also printed in it were a photo of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and photos of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, and an article on her revolutionary activities.
					
					 Under the headline of "Country of Hero" the paper carried photo-accompanied articles on the signal achievements made in the DPRK and the formation of the Blagobeshensk Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Songun Idea of Russia.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de partidos de Corea y Hungria
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de partidos de Corea y Hungria 
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar este jueves en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Partido de los Trabajadores Comunistas de Hungria. 
					  Participaron por la parte coreana el secretario Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC y por la hungara, los miembros de la delegacion del Partido de los Trabajadores Comunistas de Hungria encabezada por el presidente Gyula Thurmer. 
					
					  En la ocasion ambas partes se informaron de las actividades de los respectivos partidos e intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones entre los dos partidos y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente del presidente del PTCH
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente del presidente del PTCH
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dedicara el presidente del Partido de los Trabajadores Comunistas de Hungria, Gyula Thurmer, de visita en Corea. 
					  El visitante lo entrego el dia 14 a Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Clausurada la exposicion de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias
articles.content:
Clausurada la exposicion de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurada la Exposicion de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias en homenaje al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					　Durante la exposicion, la sede del evento fue visitada por mas de cien mil personas, inclusive los delegados a los actos festivos centrales del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares, compatriotas en ultramar y extranjeros.
					
					　La ceremonia de clausura tuvo lugar el dia 14 en la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias.
					
					　En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun, el grupo de felicitacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon por esa efemeride, los funcionarios de las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, asi como trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					　Fueron otorgados el premio extraordinario a la Unidad del Ejercito Popular de Corea a que pertenece Kim Song Dok, al Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, etc. y el premio especial al Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon.
					
					　Mas de 60 unidades recibieron el premio mejor y el de excelencia y unos participantes se llevaron el premio de merito.
					
					　El presidente del CC de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea, Kim Pyong Hun, destaco en su discurso de clausura que todos los participantes deben seguir contribuyendo en lo adelante a la celebracion mas solemne y significativa de los festivales florales de elogio a los grandes hombres.

articles.title: Periodicos condenan conspiracion belica de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Periodicos condenan conspiracion belica de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea 
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron el dia 14 sendos comentarios individuales calificando la "reunion consultiva anual para la seguridad" Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos, sesionada recientemente en Washington, de conspiracion muy peligrosa para fortalecer mas la "alianza" militar para la agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y provocar a toda costa, basandose en ella, la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					  Lo muestra la nueva "guia de planificacion estrategica", comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					　Dicen que esa guia deviene el guion mas perfecto entre los planes de la guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, siendo el proyecto universal de reaccion militar, que fusiona el "plan operacional 5027" y el "plan operacional 5015", para "hacer frente a todas las amenazas" como la "provocacion local" de alguien y la guerra total.
					
					  Esto demuestra claramente la ambicion siniestra de los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos que suenan siempre con la provocacion de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Lo que no se puede por alto es que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos anotaron por primera vez en la "declaracion conjunta" la frase "situacion inestable" de alguien, o sea, el "estado de emergencia", abogando abiertamente por prepararse para ella.
					
					 Este hecho deviene la provocacion sin precedente contra la RPDC y la muestra coherente del intento criminal de eliminarla a toda costa con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					  La realidad demuestra fehacientemente que si no se pone punto final a la confabulacion entre EE.UU. y las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas para la cooperacion militar y la provocacion de guerra, no se puede asegurar la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana ni sacar a la nacion coreana del peligro de guerra nuclear. 
					
					  Por otra parte, el periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que son incompatibles la guerra y la paz y reafirma que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea desean la paz, pero no toleran nunca a los agresores que actuan desesperadamente para desatar la guerra.

articles.title: Presidente ugandes  felicita 65o aniversario del PTC
articles.content:
Presidente ugandes  felicita 65o aniversario del PTC
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ATCC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acreditado en Uganda, Jong Thae Yang, entrego el dia 7 sus cartas credenciales al presidente de este pais, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					　En la ocasion, el mandatario africano felicito la reeleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y envio su saludo combativo a el quien dirige energicamente todas las labores del partido, el ejercito y el Estado.
					
					　Gracias al invencible poderio del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, fundado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y guiado por Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, la RPDC hace frente rotundo a las fuerzas hostiles, asevero y felicito el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
